name: Fruit Machine
description:
Just like the classic Fruit Machine - It's easy to play and comes with holds and nudges. It's free to play with loads of daily bonuses to keep you playing!

✔ Free Start Coins
✔ Daily Spin Wheel - Earn coins every day!
✔ High 90% payout!
✔ Spin Wheel win feature! Win up to 900 coins on a spin!
✔ Facebook Connect - Earn coins from Friends!
✔ Nudges and Holds!
✔ Game Centre to check your scores again friends and the world!
